statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={150.5}{e}^{{{0.0381}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0381}}\approx{1.0388351111956}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0388351111956}-{1}={0.038835111195615}\approx{0.0388} and the percent is 3.88.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
